function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased number of deaths worldwide, decline in physical and mental health due to social restrictions","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective social restrictions, vaccination campaigns, public health awareness","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, digital health passports, telemedicine","People":"Global population","Owner":"Public health authorities, governments"},{"Description":"Shut down of public spaces","Impact":"Limited access to urban green spaces, reduced opportunities for physical activity and fresh air","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and sanitization of public spaces, implementation of social distancing measures in open areas","Technologies":"Public health apps for crowd monitoring, contactless entry systems for public spaces","People":"Local residents, visitors to public spaces","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Enforcement of specific restrictions and regulations","Impact":"Disruption of daily activities, economic consequences, impact on mental health","Mitigation":"Support for affected industries, provision of mental health services, financial aid for individuals","Technologies":"Online platforms for remote work and education, digital payment systems for contactless transactions","People":"Businesses, workers, students, individuals affected by restrictions","Owner":"Government, educational institutions, businesses"}]}
